channel.title: postgre on Reber's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in postgre on Reber's Blog

item.title: PostgreSQL 简单使用
item.description: 0x00 安装 ➜ brew install postgresql ➜ echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/Cellar/postgresql/11.4/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc ➜ source ~/.zshrc -- 初始化数据库 ➜ initdb /usr/local/var/postgres ➜ pg_ctl -D /usr/local/var/postgres -l /usr/local/var/log/postgres.log start 0x01 简单操作 常用操作命令 reber=# \password #设置当前登录用户的密码 reber=# \password
